definition: to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)
late last year/the end of last year

sentences.english: Last fall, I had my first sleepover.
sentences.chinese: 去年秋天，我有了第一次外宿。

sentences.english: The reason I didn't score any points last year was because we were gamblers.
sentences.chinese: 去年我沒有獲得任何積分的原因是我們是賭棍。

sentences.english: The last was opened in Dalian in Liaoning province in February this year.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一家去年二月在遼寧大連開張。

sentences.english: Few friends has she made since she came into this school last year.
sentences.chinese: 自從去年她來到這個學校，沒交幾個朋友。

sentences.english: Last year, high winds stoked wildfires in Southern California and destroyed thousands of homes.
sentences.chinese: 去年，強烈的風勢加劇野火的災情，摧毀數千戶房屋。

sentences.english: There was adequate snow last winter.
Here are some sample questions for last year's exam.
sentences.chinese: 這是去年考試中的一些樣題。

sentences.english: Last June, Israel and Hamas agreed to a six-month truce.
sentences.chinese: 去年6月，以色列和哈馬斯同意6個月的停火協議。

sentences.english: Airbus delivered 18 of its A380 superjumbo last year.
sentences.chinese: 空中客車交付18架其A380超巨型飛機去年。

sentences.english: I haven’t met Wang Ying since last year.
sentences.chinese: 自去年以來我就未遇見過王英。

sentences.english: The deal was agreed last year and construction is expected to begin soon.
sentences.chinese: 這項輸油管道協議去年達成，修築工程預計很快開工。

sentences.english: Yes, I was last year formal abdication comes down to run Hefei group to buy a network.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我是去年正式辭職下來運作合肥團購網的。

sentences.english: He was a member of the Reading Club last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年他曾是讀書社的一員。

sentences.english: Tsheri tried to conquer Everest last year but failed.
sentences.chinese: 伽利去年就試過要征服聖母峯，不過沒有成功。

sentences.english: We visited Iowa last summer. In that neck of the woods the corn really grows tall.
sentences.chinese: 去年夏天我們訪問過衣阿華州，那地方玉米長得真高。

sentences.english: Berlin estimates it lost a record five million euros last year to fare dodgers.
sentences.chinese: 柏林估計它去年由於逃票人造成了五百萬英鎊的損失。

definition: late last year/the end of last year
within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
